About
me

Hi, Iam Rahul Son Boro, a passionate Computer Science Engineering student at Central Institute of Technology Kokrajhar, currently in my 3rd year. With a strong foundation in technology and a drive for innovation, I love exploring the world of coding, problem-solving, and software development. As an aspiring developer, I actively contribute to projects on GitHub and continuously expand my skills in programming, algorithms, and web technologies. My goal is to leverage technology to create impactful solutions while growing as a collaborative and adaptable engineer. When Iam not coding, you will find me learning new tech trends, collaborating with peers, or working on personal projects. Iam eager to connect, learn, and take on new challenges—let us build something great together!
